name: .REPP File Extension
summary: Learn about .REPP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Currently, there is no program available to effectively restore REPP files to their original state. If you have a recent backup of your files, you can perform a system restore to remove the virus, but any changes made to files after the backup was made will be lost.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
